title: Shape of You
lyrics: The club isn't the best place to find a lover...
music: Ed Sheeran, Steve Mac, Johnny McDaid
biography: Ed Sheeran is an English singer-songwriter known for his hit singles 'Shape of You' and 'Perfect'.

title: Blinding Lights
lyrics: I've been tryna call, I've been on my own for long enough...
music: Abel Tesfaye, Ahmad Balshe, Jason Quenneville
biography: The Weeknd is a Canadian singer-songwriter known for his hit single 'Blinding Lights'.

title: Bohemian Rhapsody
lyrics: Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy?...
biography: Queen is a British rock band formed in London in 1970, known for their hit 'Bohemian Rhapsody'.

title: Billie Jean
lyrics: She was more like a beauty queen from a movie scene...
biography: Michael Jackson, known as the 'King of Pop', was an American singer, songwriter, and dancer.

title: Stairway to Heaven
lyrics: There's a lady who's sure all that glitters is gold...
biography: Led Zeppelin was an English rock band formed in London in 1968, known for 'Stairway to Heaven'.

title: Rolling in the Deep
lyrics: There's a fire starting in my heart, reaching a fever pitch...
biography: Adele is an English singer-songwriter known for her powerful voice and hit 'Rolling in the Deep'.

title: Hotel California
lyrics: On a dark desert highway, cool wind in my hair...
music: Don Felder, Don Henley, Glenn Frey
biography: The Eagles are an American rock band formed in Los Angeles in 1971, known for 'Hotel California'.

title: Lose Yourself
lyrics: Look, if you had one shot or one opportunity...
music: Marshall Mathers, Jeff Bass, Luis Resto
biography: Eminem is an American rapper, songwriter, and record producer known for his hit 'Lose Yourself'.

title: Smells Like Teen Spirit
lyrics: Load up on guns, bring your friends...
biography: Nirvana was an American rock band formed in Aberdeen, Washington, in 1987, known for 'Smells Like Teen Spirit'.

title: Imagine
lyrics: Imagine there's no heaven, it's easy if you try...
biography: John Lennon was an English singer, songwriter, and peace activist, known for his song 'Imagine'.

title: Hey Jude
lyrics: Hey Jude, don't make it bad, take a sad song and make it better...
biography: The Beatles were an English rock band formed in Liverpool in 1960, known for 'Hey Jude'.

title: Like a Rolling Stone
lyrics: Once upon a time you dressed so fine, threw the bums a dime, in your prime...
biography: Bob Dylan is an American singer-songwriter, known for his influential songs like 'Like a Rolling Stone'.

title: Purple Haze
lyrics: Purple haze all in my brain, lately things just don't seem the same...
biography: Jimi Hendrix was an American rock guitarist, singer, and songwriter, known for his song 'Purple Haze'.

title: Thriller
lyrics: It's close to midnight, and something evil's lurking in the dark...
biography: Michael Jackson, known as the 'King of Pop', was an American singer, songwriter, and dancer.

title: Uptown Funk
lyrics: This hit, that ice cold, Michelle Pfeiffer, that white gold...
music: Mark Ronson, Bruno Mars, Jeff Bhasker
biography: Mark Ronson is an English-American DJ, songwriter, and record producer. Bruno Mars is an American singer, songwriter, and record producer.
